attributes.action: Do not sell either of the new aircraft carriers being built after 2015 to save money
attributes.additional_details: In 2015 the next strategic defence and security review may or may not consider the sale of one of the new Queen Elizabeth Aircraft Carriers in order to save money and raise money to run the other. This petition asks the goverment NOT to sell either and to keep them both to serve the interests of the United Kingdom. Supported by all those that sign it.
